TITLE.P: DCU-Supply of an Ultrafast Laser Spectroscopy System

SHORT_DESCR.P: DCU wishes to invite tenders for the provision an Ultrafast Laser Spectroscopy Laboratory comprising a high repetition rate (> 100 kHz) femtosecond laser system, a kHz Amplifier System pumping an IR to MIR OPA and a harmonics line. The complete laser suite should be integrated with a transient 2D-IR spectrometer and a Transient Absorption Spectrometer along with associated laser diagnostics and optical tables. An amplitude / phase controller for 800 nm is desirable. Each piece of the overall system MUST be supplied in accordance with the requirement specifications.
Ultrafast Titanium-Sapphire (800 nm) Amplifier System Optical Parametric Amplifier covering the 2 m to 15 m wavelength range Harmonics Unit providing 2nd, 3rd and 4th harmonics of Lot 1.

Lots 1-3 must be from a single supplier as the requirement to have a fully integrated system, which ensures automatic alignment of the full ultrafast laser system, and is an essential requirement in order to undertake the planned research programmes.

INFO_ADD.P: The Education Procurement Service (EPS) on behalf of Dublin City University (DCU) (the “Contracting Authorities”) invites tenders (“Tenders”) to this Request for tenders (“RFT”) from economic operators (“Tenderers”) for the supply of the goods as described in Appendix 1 to this RFT (the “Goods”).
